allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Liar''s Bar game with multi-AI agents

- Implement Liar''s Deck \(poker bluffing\) and Liar''s Dice modes
- Add 3 AI agents powered by different LLMs via OpenRouter:
  - Claude 3.5 Sonnet \(analytical, strategic\)
  - GPT-4o \(bold, unpredictable\)
  - Llama 3.1 70B \(cautious, observant\)
- Implement Russian roulette death mechanic \(6 chambers, 1 bullet\)
- Add terminal UI with ASCII art for cards and dice
- Integrate memory system for AI learning \(optional\)
- Support 1 human player vs 3 AI agents
EOF
\)")
